RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the officers: Gary Haston and Jason Cox and Josiah Bennett

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: driver of the vehicle and trailer, had trouble maintaining his vehicle and the attached trailer in a single lane, changed lanes in an unsafe manner resulting in two near-collisions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: testified about Saldana's driving, observed Saldana having trouble maintaining his vehicle and the attached trailer in a single lane
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Daniel Martin Huerta: owner of the truck and trailer, first name mentioned by Federico Saldana during the traffic stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Daniel A. Huerta: registered owner of the truck, license registered in San Antonio
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: conducted a traffic stop, witnessed the trailer veering onto the shoulder before he initiated the stop, had an objectively reasonable suspicion Saldana had committed multiple traffic violations
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston and Jason Cox and Josiah Ben: officers involved in the traffic stop and investigation of Saldana, continued examining the truck and trailer, retrieved twenty four bundles of a compressed white powder that field-tested positive for cocaine
